pr_title: GEODE-7691: Instance of parameter checked in equals method.

timeline.bodyText: I think this if check is no longer needed with the addition of the instanceof check
timeline.author: jhuynh1

timeline.bodyText: Not sure if we want this check here... the super implementation just checks values.  So a DummyQRegion could in theory be checked against a base QRegion and still return true.. in this case it would return false.
timeline.author: jhuynh1

replies.bodyText: My bad again. Modified the superclass to do an instance check.
replies.author: nabarunnag

timeline.bodyText: same, this can probably be removed since the instanceof check will return early if other is null
timeline.author: jhuynh1
